dataItem.name: LOC_1
dataItem.expression: substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 1,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 3,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 5,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 7,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 9,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 11,2)

dataItem.name: LOC_2
dataItem.expression: substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 1,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 3,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 5,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 7,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 9,2) + ' ' + substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 11,2)

dataSource.reportExpression: IF ( ( NOT ( [DATE_LAST_ISSUED] IS NULL) AND ( [DATE_LAST_RETURNED] IS NULL) ) ) THEN ( [DATE_LAST_ISSUED] ) ELSE IF ( ( ( [DATE_LAST_ISSUED] IS NULL) AND NOT ( [DATE_LAST_RETURNED] IS NULL) ) ) THEN ( [DATE_LAST_RETURNED] ) ELSE IF ( ( ( [DATE_LAST_ISSUED] IS NULL) AND ( [DATE_LAST_RETURNED] IS NULL) ) ) THEN ( [DATE_LAST_ISSUED] ) ELSE IF ( [DATE_LAST_ISSUED] > [DATE_LAST_RETURNED] ) THEN ( [DATE_LAST_ISSUED] ) ELSE ( [DATE_LAST_RETURNED] )
